item.title: A Roadmap for Exceptional Access Research
item.description: Authors: Mayank Varia Published: December 2018 URL: https://www.lawfareblog.com/roadmap-exceptional-access-research Abstract: This is part of a series of essays from the Crypto 2018 Workshop on Encryption and Surveillance.
